description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Take on an alien army, in a continually escalating war!  Pilot your UFO into the heart of the enemy base and try to come back in one piece.  See if you can top your high score.  Includes deformable terrain, multiple vehicles, and four unique worlds.
description.short: Take on an alien army, in a continually escalating war!  Pilot your UFO into the heart of the enemy base and try to come back in one piece.  See if you can top your high score.  Includes deformable terrain, multiple vehicles, and four unique worlds.
